name: Forward & Backward
description:
Forward & Backward is a 2d platformer where you need do finish the level forwards and backwards!

This game was created for the VimJam2020 in under a week. This is also the first game I published. Any feedback is appreciated.

The game contain 15 unique level with many puzzles to solve.

CREDITS

SFXs, Programming, Level Design & Artwork by Iombra(me)

Background Music provided by dl-sounds.com

TOOLS

  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • Paint.NET

HOW TO PLAY

Controls:

  1. A/D to Move
  2. Space to jump
  3. ESC to open menu
  4. Mouse for using menus

Download the zip file and open the .exe file. Enjoy!
